lead_paragraph: LUBOW--Joyce. The Board of Directors of 465 WEA Owners Corp., and the shareholders, staff, and management of 465 West End Avenue, are deeply saddened by the passing of Joyce Lubow, the beloved wife of our Board member for the past 34 years, Nathan Lubow. Cherished mother of Susie and Andrew, adored grandmother and great-grandmother; an interested and concerned neighbor and friend. We will sorely miss her and extend our deepest sympathy to the entire family at this difficult time. 1/3
